about_the_game:
The curse of the Vampire falls upon you


Unlock a new curse to choose for your expeditions!
Succumb to a mysterious cloaked figure’s bite and reincarnate as a vengeful but classy Vampire!

Quench your thirst and collect blood from other adventurers! On a dead corpse or directly on a fresh prey, the Vampire needs to harvest blood to reach its full potential.

Once replenished, the Vampire is more agile and will dominate the temples. You can use your blood to improve your abilities, be faster or even turn into a flying bat and evade enemies and deadly traps.

Content :

The Curse of the Vampire, that you will be able to select at the beginning of a round (activates upon dying). The more you play with the curse, the more its level will rise and the more rewards you will unlock!


Including (to unlock in game) :
  • Customizable and upgradable Vampire skills
  • “Vampire manor” theme housing furniture to decorate your personal house!
  • “Vampire” themed clothing cosmetics to dress up as a charismatic vampire!
  • In-game title
